pageContext.claim: “But we've already won the case against -- for the termination of Obamacare -- against Obamacare.”
pageContext.analysis: The Trump administration originally did not seek a sweeping repeal of the Affordable Care Act. It simply asked that the court nullify provisions that protected people with preexisting conditions. So court ruled against the position taken by the administration. But Trump now declares that is a win. Refusing to defend the law already was a flip-flop from Trump's pledge to retain protections for people with existing health conditions. Few legal expect believe the ruling will survive the appeal process.
